attributes.action: Make Resus training mandatory for all mums and not just premature mums(dads too)
attributes.additional_details: I think this needs to be mandatory for every parent as my son wouldn't have survived without the training I recieved before he was discharged from hospital. Parents need to be made aware of how to help their child in a situation like this incase paramedics cannot reach them in time
attributes.background: My son was 13 weeks premature so I luckily got the training. At 12 weeks old, when he was home with me he stopped breathing then 4 hours later on our way home from the hospital it happened again, as I had the training I saved his life before the ambulance got to us.
